name: Infinite Scarcity
description:
NOTE:  BEST IN FULL SCREEN WITH A GAME CONTROLLER
NOTE:  Please look at the How To Play section and read the notes at the bottom here.

Collect as many resources as you can to help the After Earth colonies. 

Controls:  

Run:  WASD, Arrows, bluetooth controller d-pad/joystick to move.

Jump:  Space             Dig:  "J"  Key, Left Mouse, CTRL 

Tip:  Make use of MULTIPLE wall jumps.

Tip:  You get heavier and slower the more gems you collect in a single level, your weight and speed is reset after each level.

Tip:  There are multiple secrets in every level (switches, hard to get gems, secret digging areas, etc.).

Tip:  Resource color effects value, the rarer the gem, the more points its worth:  red, blue,  yellow, purple, rainbow.

Credits:  Programming, music composition, art, animation, special effects all Gray Hato (1 person).
